title: Justice Department sues utility company over 2020 Bobcat Fire
description: Federal prosecutors allege the Bobcat Fire was caused by the negligence of utility company Southern California Edison and its tree maintenance contractor.

title: Businessman Mohamed Al Fayed, father of Dodi Al Fayed, dead at 94
description: Mohamed Al Fayed, the Egyptian businessman who rose to prominence through multiple industries, has died, according to Fulham FC.

title: Police release body camera video showing officer fatally shooting pregnant woman
description: Blendon Township police released video showing one of its officers fatally shooting a woman who accelerated her car towards the officer after allegedly stealing.

title: What to know about BA.2.86 as it spreads to 5 states
description: The new variant BA.2.86 has been detected in five states: Michigan, New York, Ohio, Texas and Virginia. Here's what you need to know about it.

title: Spain legal panel opens case against suspended soccer chief over World Cup kiss
description: A Spanish government legal panel is opening a case against suspended soccer chief Luis Rubiales

title: 'Tampon tax' eliminated in Texas, along with tax on baby diapers, bottles and more
description: Residents of Texas no longer have to pay a sales tax on menstrual products.

title: Body found in trash ID'd as missing 2-year-old, father to be charged with murder
description: Artavoius North will be charged in the murder of his 2-year-old son, J'Asiah Mitchell. North had wrongly reported that Mitchell was kidnapped last month.

title: Man who police blocked from warning drivers of speed trap wins $50K judgment
description: Delaware State Police have agreed to pay $50,000 to resolve a federal lawsuit filed by a man who said troopers violated his constitutional rights by preventing him from warning motorists about a speed trap

title: More than 85,000 highchairs are under recall after two dozen reports of falls
description: Federal regulators say more than 85,000 highchairs sold at major retailers across North America are being recalled due to a fall hazard after a handful of injuries were reported

title: Metal factory explosion in Brazil kills 2 people and injures several others
description: State officials in southern Brazil say an explosion at a metal factory has killed two people and seriously injured at least 12 others

title: Woman charged in murder-for-hire plot to kill husband
description: Tatyana Remley has been accused of trying to hire someone to kill her husband in a murder-for-hire plot. She will appear in court in November.

title: Former Proud Boy Dominic Pezzola sentenced to 10 years for role in Jan. 6 attack
description: A former Proud Boy member who was convicted for his actions in the Jan. 6 attacks on the U.S. Capitol was sentenced to 10 years in prison on Friday.

title: White teen charged with attempted murder after allegedly trying to drown Black youth
description: A white teen is charged with attempted murder after allegedly trying to drown a Black juvenile.

title: Daring helicopter rescue earns Vietnam veteran Medal of Honor 55 years later
description: President Joe Biden will make the award Sept. 5 at the White House.

title: Judge strikes down Texas law requiring age verification to view pornographic websites
description: A federal judge has struck down a Texas law requiring age verification and health warnings to view pornographic websites and blocked the state attorney general’s office from enforcing it

title: Nursing homes must boost staffing levels under new Biden plan
description: The Biden administration plans to regulate nursing home staffing levels for the first time, amid questions about quality of care.

title: ATF proposes rule to close 'gun show loophole'
description: The ATF moves to close what gun control advocates have termed the "gun show loophole" by narrowing the definition of those "engaged in the business" of a firearms dealer.

title: State election officials prepare for efforts to disqualify Trump under 14th Amendment
description: Efforts to keep Donald Trump off the 2024 ballot are gaining momentum as secretaries of state are preparing for or starting to respond to challenges to his candidacy.

title: Rifle slaying of a brown bear in Italy leaves 2 cubs motherless and is decried
description: The slaying of a brown bear near an Italian national park has left her two young cubs motherless and sparked outrage in much of the country

title: Greece: Firefighters rescue 25 migrants trapped in burning forest
description: Greek firefighters have rescued a group of 25 migrants trapped in a forest in northeastern Greece as flames from a massive wildfire burning for two weeks approached

title: Biden wants an extra $4B for disaster relief, bringing total request to $16B
description: Climate change is imposing ever higher costs on U.S. taxpayers.

title: US jobs report for August could point to a moderating pace of hiring as economy slows
description: Slowly and steadily, an overheated American job market is cooling.

title: Swiss glacier watcher warns recent heat wave threatens severe melt again this year
description: A top glacier watcher has warned that a warm early summer and a heat wave last week could have caused severe glacier melt across Switzerland, threatening to make 2023 the second-worst year for ice loss after a record thaw last year

title: Your Labor Day weekend travel forecast
description: Labor Day weekend travel is about to get underway. Here's what you need to know before hitting the road or heading to the airport.

title: 98-year-old German is charged as an accessory to murder at a Nazi concentration camp
description: German prosecutors say a 98-year-old man has been charged with being an accessory to murder as a guard at the Nazis’ Sachsenhausen concentration camp between 1943 and 1945

title: Pope Francis arrives in Mongolia for first visit by a pontiff
description: Pope Francis arrives in Mongolia for first visit by a pontiff as Vatican relations with Russia and China remain strained

title: Hong Kong, parts of south China grind to near standstill as Super Typhoon Saola nears
description: Most of Hong Kong and other parts of southern China ground to a near standstill as Super Typhoon Saola edged closer Friday

title: Alaska board of education votes to ban transgender girls from school girls teams
description: The Alaska state board of education voted Thursday to support banning transgender girls from competing on high school girls athletic teams, sending the issue to the attorney general

title: Car bombs and hostage-taking inside prisons underscore Ecuador's fragile security
description: The fragile security of Ecuador has been underscored by the explosions of four car bombs and the hostage-taking of more than 50 law enforcement officers inside various detention facilities

title: Residents return to find homes gone, towns devastated in path of Idalia
description: Tropical Storm Idalia's path of destruction through four states has left behind it shattered towns and shocked residents, even as it missed many urban areas

title: Pope Francis arrives in Mongolia for first visit by a pontiff
description: Pope Francis arrives in Mongolia for first visit by a pontiff as Vatican relations with Russia and China remain strained

title: 2nd man charged in July shooting at massive Indiana block party that killed 1
description: A prosecutor has charged the second man arrested in a July shooting at a massive block party in central Indiana that left one person dead and 17 others wounded

title: 2 years on, the Afghanistan withdrawal lingers over the Biden administration
description: Two years on, the Afghanistan withdrawal continues to cast a pall as President Joe Biden seeks reelection, experts tell ABC News.
